origin.origins.allay.description: These friendly fairies love the sweet sounds of music, and a yummy cookie :).
origin.origins.allay.name: Allay
origin.origins.arachnid.description: Their climbing abilities and the ability to trap their foes in a spiderweb make the Arachnid perfect hunters
origin.origins.arachnid.name: Arachnid
origin.origins.avian.description: The Avian race has lost their ability to fly a long time ago. Now these peaceful creatures can be seen gliding from one place to another
origin.origins.avian.name: Avian
origin.origins.blazeborn.description: Late descendants of the Blaze, the Blazeborn are naturally immune to the perils of the Nether
origin.origins.blazeborn.name: Blazeborn
origin.origins.bumblebee.description: Bees are cool. They fly and enjoy flowers and die
origin.origins.bumblebee.name: BumbleBee
origin.origins.creep.description: Silent but deadly, the Creep are skilled in the arts of stealth, however they are TERRIBLY allergic to cats
origin.origins.creep.name: Creep
origin.origins.elytrian.description: Often flying around in the winds, Elytrians are uncomfortable when they dont have enough space above their head
origin.origins.elytrian.name: Elytrian
origin.origins.enderian.description: Born as the children of the Ender Dragon, Enderians are capable of teleporting, but are vulnerable to water
origin.origins.enderian.name: Enderian
origin.origins.feline.description: With their cat-like appearance, the Feline scare creepers away. With the dexterity of cats, they always land safely on their feet
origin.origins.feline.name: Feline
origin.origins.human.description: A regular human. Your ordinary Minecraft experience awaits
origin.origins.human.name: Human
origin.origins.merling.description: These natural inhabitants of the ocean are not used to being out of the water for too long
origin.origins.merling.name: Merling
origin.origins.phantom.description: As half-human and half-phantom beings, these creatures can switch between a Phantom and a normal form
origin.origins.phantom.name: Phantom
origin.origins.piglin.description: Born in the nether and trained by the ancient ancestors of the pigs, you love shiny things and are extremely skilled with a crossbow
origin.origins.piglin.name: Piglin
origin.origins.rabbit.description: These furry bunnies are extremely good jumpers and have amazing agility
origin.origins.rabbit.name: Rabbit
origin.origins.shulk.description: Related to Shulkers, the bodies of the Shulk are outfitted with a protective shell-like skin
origin.origins.shulk.name: Shulk
origin.origins.sculkling.description: Often found lurking in the Deep Dark, these creatures are dangerous, but weak when exposed to light
origin.origins.sculkling.name: Skulkling
origin.origins.slimeling.description: Part Human, part Slime. Very unpleasant to touch
origin.origins.slimeling.name: Slimeling
origin.origins.starborne.description: Being born from the stars, you are a nonviolent, star-obsessed, mysterious, and potentially powerful entity that fell from the stars down to this blocky world we reside.
origin.origins.starborne.name: Starborne
power.origins.aerial_combatant.descripti: You deal substantially more damage while in Elytra Flight
power.origins.aerial_combatant.name: Aerial Combatant
power.origins.allay_sparkle.description: You have a mysterious sparkle, and glow in the dark.
power.origins.allay_sparkle.name: Bioluminescent
power.origins.aqua_affinity.description: You may break blocks underwater as others do on land
power.origins.aqua_affinity.name: Aqua Affinity
power.origins.atrophy.name: Atrophy
power.origins.bee_flight.description: Double tap space bar to jump while in air to fly
power.origins.bee_flight.name: Flap
power.origins.blast_resistance.name: Blast Resistant
power.origins.burn_hot_biomes.name: Melting Skin
power.origins.burn_in_daylight.descripti: You begin to burn in daylight if you are not invisible
power.origins.burn_in_daylight.name: Photoallergic
power.origins.burning_wrath.description: When on fire, you deal additional damage with your attacks
power.origins.burning_wrath.name: Burning Wrath
power.origins.carnivore.description: You diet is restricted to meat, you can't eat vegetables
power.origins.carnivore.name: Carnivore
power.origins.cat_vision.description: You can slightly see in the dark when not in water
power.origins.cat_vision.name: Nocturnal
power.origins.claustrophobia.description: Being somewhere with a low ceiling for too long will weaken you and make you slower
power.origins.claustrophobia.name: Claustrophobia
power.origins.climbing.description: You are able to climb up any kind of wall, just not ladders
power.origins.climbing.name: Climbing
power.origins.collector.name: Collector
power.origins.cookie_saturation.descript: Cookies give the same saturation as steak
power.origins.cookie_saturation.name: COOKIES
power.origins.creep_sprint.description: Every 30 seconds you can sprint for 15 seconds unless your in a thunderstorm
power.origins.creep_sprint.name: Sprint
power.origins.dash.description: Every 30 seconds you can dash forward with great speed
power.origins.dash.name: Warriors Charge
power.origins.decaying_essence.descripti: Over time your armor slowly disintegrates
power.origins.decaying_essence.name: Decaying Essence
power.origins.drop_foot.description: You may drop a rabbit's foot when hit
power.origins.drop_foot.name: Delicious
power.origins.elytra.description: You have Elytra wings without needing to equip any
power.origins.elytra.name: Winged
power.origins.explode_on_fire.name: Light the Fuse
power.origins.explode_tick_toggle.descri: You can explode at will by holding shift, toggleable with keybind
power.origins.explode_tick_toggle.name: BOOOM
power.origins.extra_reach.description: You can reach blocks and entities further away
power.origins.extra_reach.name: Slender Body
power.origins.fall_immunity.description: You never take fall damage, no matter from which height you fall
power.origins.fall_immunity.name: Acrobatics
power.origins.fire_immunity.description: You are immune to all types of fire damage
power.origins.fire_immunity.name: Fire Immunity
power.origins.flower_bloom.description: You gain regeneration when near flowers but you can only eat honey and fruit
power.origins.flower_bloom.name: Bloom
power.origins.fragile.description: You have 3 less hearts of health than humans
power.origins.fragile.name: Fragile
power.origins.fresh_air.description: When sleeping, your bed needs to be at an altitude of at least 86 blocks, so you can breathe fresh air
power.origins.fresh_air.name: Fresh Air
power.origins.hotblooded.description: Due to your hot body, venoms burn up, making you immune to poison and hunger status effects
power.origins.hotblooded.name: Hotblooded
power.origins.hunger_over_time.descripti: Being phantomized causes you to become hungry
power.origins.hunger_over_time.name: Fast Metabolism
power.origins.illagers_hurt_more.descrip: Illagers and crossbows deal 2x damage to you.
power.origins.illagers_hurt_more.name: Prey
power.origins.invisibility.name: Invisibility
power.origins.jukebox_enderchest.descrip: Stand on a Jukebox to open a personal stash inside the jukebox
power.origins.jukebox_enderchest.name: Jukebox Stash
power.origins.jump_boost.name: Strong Hopper
power.origins.launch_into_air.descriptio: Every 30 seconds you are able to launch about 20 blocks up into the air
power.origins.launch_into_air.name: Gift of the Winds
power.origins.lay_eggs.description: Whenever you wake up in the morning, you will lay an egg
power.origins.lay_eggs.name: Oviparous
power.origins.light_armor.description: You cannot wear any heavy armor (armor with protection values higher than chainmail)
power.origins.light_armor.name: Need for Mobility
power.origins.like_water.description: When underwater, you do not sink to the ground unless you want to
power.origins.like_water.name: Like Water
power.origins.luck.description: You have increased chances of getting treasure loot
power.origins.luck.name: Treasure Finder
power.origins.master_of_webs.description: You navigate cobweb perfectly, and are able to climb in them. When you hit an enemy, they get stuck in cobweb for a while. Non-arthropods stuck in cobweb will be sensed by you.
power.origins.master_of_webs.name: Master of Webs
power.origins.mimic_warden.description: You can emmit a sonic boom every 60 seconds, only if you have enough energy to sprint
power.origins.mimic_warden.name: Carrier of Echos
power.origins.more_axe_damage.descriptio: You deal extra damage with axes.
power.origins.more_axe_damage.name: Brutish Training
power.origins.more_exhaustion.descriptio: You exhaust much quicker than others, thus requiring you to eat more
power.origins.more_exhaustion.name: Large Appetite
power.origins.more_kinetic_damage.descri: You take more damage from falling and flying into blocks
power.origins.more_kinetic_damage.name: Brittle Bones
power.origins.natural_armor.description: Even without wearing armor, your skin provides natural protection
power.origins.natural_armor.name: Sturdy Skin
power.origins.nether_gear.description: You are accustomed to the gear of the nether (You can only wear gold, stone, leather, and netherite tools/weapons/armor)
power.origins.nether_gear.name: Brutish Gear
power.origins.nether_hide.description: You have a stronger skin than most, you get 2 more armor bars zombify in the overworld
power.origins.nether_hide.name: Nether hide
power.origins.nether_spawn.description: Your natural spawn will be in the Nether
power.origins.nether_spawn.name: Nether Inhabitant
power.origins.nine_lives.description: You have 1 less heart of health than humans
power.origins.nine_lives.name: Nine Lives
power.origins.no_gravity.description: You have small wings, you can fly and float, but are 40% smaller than a normal human
power.origins.no_gravity.name: Little Fairy
power.origins.no_shield.description: The way your hands are formed provide no way of holding a shield upright
power.origins.no_shield.name: Unwieldy
power.origins.no_totem.description: The sight of totems disgusts you, you have no need for such vile things.
power.origins.no_totem.name: Ill Omen
power.origins.phantomize.description: You can switch between human and phantom form at will, but only while you are saturated enough to sprint
power.origins.phantomize.name: Phantom Form
power.origins.phasing.description: While phantomized, you can walk through solid material, except Obsidian
power.origins.phasing.name: Phasing
power.origins.piglin_brothers.descriptio: You are one of the pigmen, they will not attack you unless provoked.
power.origins.piglin_brothers.name: Piglin Brothers
power.origins.poison_hit.description: Upon hitting an entity, they have a 35% chance of being poisoned
power.origins.poison_hit.name: Stinger
power.origins.poison_on_hit.description: Upon being hit, you have a 20% chance of getting poisoned.
power.origins.poison_on_hit.name: Unstable Entity
power.origins.pumpkin_hate.description: You are afraid of pumpkins. For a good reason
power.origins.pumpkin_hate.name: Scared of Gourds
power.origins.scare_creepers.description: Creepers are scared of you and will only explode if you attack them first
power.origins.scare_creepers.name: Catlike Appearance
power.origins.shulker_inventory.descript: You have access to an additional 9 slots of inventory, which keep the items on death
power.origins.shulker_inventory.name: Hoarder
power.origins.skulk_block_buff.descripti: You get buffs while near sculk blocks
power.origins.skulk_block_buff.name: Amongst Your People
power.origins.slime_block_bounce.descrip: You bounce on every block as if it were a slime block
power.origins.slime_block_bounce.name: Boing Boing
power.origins.slime_skin.description: You have the green skin of a slime, and when too cold you become more solid
power.origins.slime_skin.name: Slime-Like
power.origins.slow_falling.description: You fall as gently to the ground as a feather would, unless you sneak.
power.origins.slow_falling.name: Featherweight
power.origins.slower.description: You are slower than the normal human
power.origins.slower.name: Slower
power.origins.slower_nighttime.descripti: You are sleepy at night, you walk and fly slower
power.origins.slower_nighttime.name: Sleepy Bee
power.origins.sprint_jump.description: You are able to jump higher by jumping while sprinting
power.origins.sprint_jump.name: Strong Ankles
power.origins.strong_arms.description: You are strong enough to break natural stones without using a pickaxe
power.origins.strong_arms.name: Strong Arms
power.origins.stronger_thunderstorm.desc: During thunderstorms, you are significantly stronger
power.origins.stronger_thunderstorm.name: Charged
power.origins.swim_speed.name: Fins
power.origins.tailwind.description: You are a little bit quicker on foot than others
power.origins.tailwind.name: Tailwind
power.origins.throw_ender_pearl.descript: Whenever you want, you may throw an ender pearl which deals no damage, allowing you to teleport
power.origins.throw_ender_pearl.name: Teleportation
power.origins.tick_leap_toggle.descripti: You can leap in the direction you are looking to
power.origins.tick_leap_toggle.name: Big Leap
power.origins.vegetarian.name: Vegetarian
power.origins.velvet_paws.description: Your footsteps don't cause any vibrations which could otherwise be picked up by nearby lifeforms
power.origins.velvet_paws.name: Velvet Paws
power.origins.water_breathing.descriptio: You can breathe underwater, but not on land
power.origins.water_breathing.name: Gills
power.origins.water_vision.name: Wet Eyes
power.origins.water_vulnerability.descri: You receive damage over time while in contact with water
power.origins.water_vulnerability.name: Hydrophobia
power.origins.weak_arms.description: When not under the effect of a strength potion, you can only mine natural stone if there are at most 2 other natural stone blocks adjacent to it
power.origins.weak_arms.name: Weak Arms
power.origins.weaker_light.description: You are much weaker in the light
power.origins.weaker_light.name: Afraid of the Light
power.star.descriptions/blindness.descri: In the great abyss of space, violence is uncommon if you even come across someone in the first place, this results in you having a small chance to be immobilized upon taking damage.
power.star.descriptions/blindness.name: §c§nNonviolent
power.star.descriptions/credits.name: §3§nCredits
power.star.descriptions/death.descriptio: All the collected star energy that you have accumulated through your time in the stars needs to go somewhere, So whenever you happen to meet your demise you will explode in a great Supernova if you are not sneaking, however, you will need exposure to the stars to refill that energy.
power.star.descriptions/death.name: §6§nSupernova
power.star.descriptions/fire.description: You are used to the cold environment of space so fire isn't exactly something you're used to, this results in taking double damage from all fire-related sources.
power.star.descriptions/fire.name: §c§nCold Vacuum
power.star.descriptions/slow.description: You just §llove§r to watch the stars, and when not exposed to them you get a little sad and will move a bit slower.
power.star.descriptions/slow.name: §c§nStarwatcher
power.star.descriptions/starbeam.descrip: §f[Secondary]§r You can shoot a star beam to deal 10 damage with a 6 second cooldown.
power.star.descriptions/starbeam.name: §a§nShooting Star
power.star.descriptions/strength.descrip: During the night when you can observe the stars, the cosmos grants you a mysterious power that results in regeneration and speed with moon-like gravity unless you sneak.
power.star.descriptions/strength.name: §a§nBorn From the Stars
power.star.descriptions/velocity.descrip: §f[Primary]§r You can condense your star energy to make you gain mediocre velocity and make a star circle behind you to fling others too close into the air.
power.star.descriptions/velocity.name: §a§nSpeedy Star
